description: This file implements methods for an HTTP protocol processing object related to version 2 of a proto server. It includes functions for queuing, receiving, finishing, accepting client connections, and authenticating sessions specific to HTTP PSOver2. The code defines behavior for processing HTTP requests from clients in a server context.

classes.name: HTTP_PSO_VER2_OBJECT
classes.description: Represents the HTTP Protocol Service Object version 2, containing methods and state for processing HTTP communication.

classes.name: HTTP_TRANS_RECORD_OBJECT
classes.description: Represents a transaction record for HTTP requests/responses.

classes.name: HTTP_WAM_INTERFACE
classes.description: Interface for web access management, handling client connection acceptance.

methods.name: ULONG HttpPsoVer2QueryForClient(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,PVOID buffer,ULONG ulSize,ANSC_HANDLE hBufferContext)
methods.description: Determines processing mode for incoming data, deciding whether to process, collect, or forward based on current transaction state.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS HttpPsoVer2RecvFromClient(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,PVOID buffer,ULONG ulSize,ANSC_HANDLE hBufferContext)
methods.description: Processes data received from the client, passing it to the current transaction record.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS HttpPsoVer2FinishedByClient(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,PVOID buffer,ULONG ulSize,ANSC_HANDLE hBufferContext)
methods.description: Handles the closing of a client connection, signaling the transaction is complete.

methods.name: BOOL HttpPsoVer2AcceptClient(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hReserved)
methods.description: Accepts and verifies a new client connection.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS HttpPsoVer2Authenticate(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hReserved)
methods.description: Performs session authentication (stub implementation always returning success).
